items.summary: Trump's order to block 'woke' AI in government leads tech companies to censor chatbots sold to federal government, posing challenges in ensuring compliance.

items.summary: Intel is cutting back spending and workforce in an effort to revive the struggling chip maker's fortunes under its new CEO.

items.summary: Vulkan + Mesa Drivers are showing potential for AI inferencing on Radeon RADV, with NVIDIA finding success with Vulkan for AI and machine learning. Red Hat engineer David Airlie is exploring their potential for AI applications.

items.title: AI is being used to design custom proteins that help immune cells find and kill cancer
items.summary: AI is being used to design custom proteins that help immune cells find and kill cancer - Scientists have harnessed artificial intelligence to engineer custom proteins, acting as a GPS for the immune system. These proteins guide T cells with precision to cancer cells, enhancing their ability to destroy tumors effectively.

items.title: Engineers are backbone of Arunachal’s progress: Governor
items.summary: Engineers are described as the backbone of Arunachal Pradesh's development by Governor Lt Gen (Retd) K T Parnaik, emphasizing their crucial role in translating government policy into infrastructure. He encouraged engineers to embrace their role and contribute to the state's progress.

items.title: Stop building in China, hiring in India, Trump warns tech majors
items.summary: President Trump urges American tech companies to prioritize hiring in the US, rather than in countries like India and China, in order to curb overseas job creation. He criticizes 'radical globalism' and advocates for a shift towards national loyalty.

items.title: Show HN: An embedding space neighbor finder (doppelgängers)
items.summary: An individual built a lookalike finder using an embedding space neighbor finder for celebrities, with plans to expand to the full latent space of human faces in the future. They are seeking feedback on the user interface.
